content.en: Algorithmic PID Optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to improve the performance of PID controllers in various industrial processes. These algorithms, such as Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) and QUATRE, are computational intelligence techniques that optimize the parameters of PID controllers for better control performance. By applying these algorithms, researchers aim to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of PID controllers in real-time non-linear processes, water turbine governors, pulp and paper industry processes, and more.
content.da: Algoritmisk PID-optimering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre ydeevnen af PID-regulatorer i forskellige industrielle processer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Partikel Swarm Optimering (PSO) og QUATRE, er computational intelligence teknikker, der optimerer parametrene for PID-regulatorer for bedre reguleringsydelse. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre effektiviteten og virkningen af PID-regulatorer i realtids ikke-lineære processer, vandturbineregulatorer, papir- og masseindustriens processer og mere.
